Description:
Sign up to try GitHub Copilot app modernization for C++ in Private Preview: https://aka.ms/cpp-agents-private-preview

GitHub Copilot app modernization for C++ helps you migrate your C++ projects to the latest version of the Microsoft C++ (MSVC) Build Tools. Title: Upgrade MSVC with GitHub Copilot app modernization for C++
